3. Intervention targeted at women of

3.1 Intermittent iron and folic acid supplementation in menstruating women
WHO RECOMMENDATION
Intermittent iron and folic acid supplementation is recommended as a public health 
intervention in menstruating women living in settings where anaemia is highly prevalent, 
to improve their haemoglobin concentrations and iron status and reduce the risk of 
anaemia.
